channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cool It Carol!
channel.desc: A young couple journey to Swinging London in search of fame and fortune. But with work scarce, they get drawn into the seedy world of modelling and sex work. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Can You Keep It Up For A Week?
channel.desc: Comedy. Annette will marry Gil, her hapless boyfriend, on the condition he keeps his new job for a week without getting up to mischief with other women. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey Bussell
channel.desc: Darcey begins her royal road trip at the Highland Games in Balmoral, before sampling royal whisky and attempting a dance at the Ghillies Ball.

channel.title: Garden Rescue

channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Sutton Coldfield to create an Australian-inspired space to rekindle happy memories for Claire and Andy of their years spent living in Melbourne.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives bricklayer Marcus and property manager Hailey the cash to buy, renovate and sell a dilapidated semi in Wigan. Can they turn it into a habitable family home and sell it for a profit.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Britain's Beautiful Rivers
channel.desc: Richard explores the wilds of Scotland as he journeys down the River Clyde, in search of clawed alien invertebrates and other elusive species, and learns about the impact the Clyde has had globally.

channel.title: Tool Club
channel.desc: The team have almost finished the bookshop in Dumfries. Homeowner Denise renovates her dilapidated pergola.
